section: Introduction to Wajahat Ali's Personal Journey

questions.question: Can you describe the recent challenges your daughter faced regarding her health?
What was your emotional state leading up to the liver transplant?
How did you feel when you learned that your daughter received a liver transplant?

section: Lessons Learned and Call to Action

questions.question: What important lesson did you take away from this experience?
